name: Death of a spaceman
description:
Something wrong happened and the space station you were working in has been severely damaged. You need to survive until you find a way to send a message and get rescued!

This is more of a technical demo, the game uses procedural generation to create and assemble a space station each time a new game is created. In the future I will upload the whole project to Github in case anyone is interested in the code.

All audio and video assets used are free assets found in the unity store.
